quotes.quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Change is the end result of all true learning.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: Education is the passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Education is what remains after one has forgotten what one has learned in school.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The more that you read, the more things you will know, the more that you learn, the more places you'll go.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Education without values, as useful as it is, seems rather to make man a more clever devil.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The learning process continues until the day you die.
quotes.author: Kirk Douglas

quotes.quote: Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire.
quotes.author: W.B. Yeats

quotes.quote: Develop a passion for learning. If you do, you will never cease to grow.
quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.quote: Education is not preparation for life; education is life itself.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.quote: Knowledge is power. Information is liberating. Education is the premise of progress, in every society, in every family.
quotes.author: Kofi Annan

quotes.quote: A person who won't read has no advantage over one who can't read.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Education is a better safeguard of liberty than a standing army.
quotes.author: Edward Everett

quotes.quote: They know enough who know how to learn.
quotes.author: Henry Adams

quotes.quote: Upon the subject of education ... I can only say that I view it as the most important subject which we as a people may be engaged in.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Learning is like rowing upstream: not to advance is to drop back.
quotes.author: Chinese proverb

quotes.quote: Nine-tenths of education is encouragement.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: Man can learn nothing except by going from the known to the unknown.
quotes.author: Claude Bernard

quotes.quote: Education is the ability to listen to almost anything without losing your temper or your self-confidence.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Learning is not attained by chance, it must be sought for with ardor and attended to with diligence.
quotes.author: Abigail Adams

quotes.quote: Educating the mind without educating the heart is no education at all.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: It is as impossible to withhold education from the receptive mind as it is impossible to force it upon the unreasoning.
quotes.author: Agnes Repplierg

quotes.quote: They cannot stop me. I will get my education, if it is in the home, school, or anyplace.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai
